name: [Genuine] Mods

screenshots.caption: Spells have icons on their targets when cast.
Each mod functions separately yet works seamlessly together

short_description:
This mod pack features six completely original Minecraft mods:

[Genuine] Npc: A mod that adds new mobs to the game. They are leveled, named, tamable, and have stats.

[Genuine] Spell System: A mod that adds spells, passives, and abilities into the game learn-able by reading them from tomes.

[Genuine] Elements: A comprehensive element system that adds more tools, armor, and items into the game. Elements have different effects for different items.

[Genuine] Closed Captions: A new way to enjoy Minecraft by making sounds appear as text on your screen. Made the the hearing impaired in mind and useful for players without sound.

[Genuine] Trophy: Adds a craft-able block that is used to display mobs from the game. Also can display modded mobs.

[Genuine] Battle Text: Now you can SEE what kind of damage you are doing. Text pops out where you hit with colors, the damage type, and the amount hit for.
summary: A collection of original Minecraft mods.
